sentences.en: A matte screen with horizontal and vertical lines. This screen facilitates composition of your photograph.
sentences.cn: 具有水平和垂直线的磨砂型屏, 这种屏便于您所拍摄的照片的合成.

sentences.en: All leads are coated with 100 % matte tin, and there is no lead inside the package.
sentences.cn: 所有的引脚均镀以100%雾锡, 封装内无铅存在.

sentences.en: Gold Class Endurance Original formula leaves a dark satin matte finish.
sentences.cn: 金装持续原始配方可提高黑色的光泽度.

sentences.en: Gouache paints dry to a matte finish and, if desired, without visible Brush marks.
sentences.cn: 广告色画干时表面无光, 如果要求效果,也能使刷痕看不见.

sentences.en: If the new machine is not used chip, then contact the surface should be matte.
sentences.cn: 如果是新机未用过的芯片, 则触点表层应是磨砂的.

sentences.en: Kurt saw they stood upon a matte - black surface flush with the floor.
sentences.cn: 库尔特看到他们站在一块不光滑黑色的表面似乎在流动的地板上.

sentences.en: Many wooden boxes are painted and you can pick glossy ink or matte ink.
sentences.cn: 很多木盒都是油漆的,您可以用亮光漆和哑光漆.

sentences.en: Matt ( Matte ): The appearance of dull, lusterless.
sentences.cn: 无光 ( 哑色 ): 暗淡而无光彩的外观.

sentences.en: Matte Finish Gel is perfect for all skin types.
sentences.cn: 适合任何皮肤人士选用.

sentences.en: Polish the nail with a matte beige shade.
sentences.cn: 涂上亚光粗糙感的米色甲油.

sentences.en: Result: skin stay clear and matte all day long.
sentences.cn: 皮肤得到适度的保湿,并保持清爽,控油一整天.

sentences.en: The booms a brushed matte sliver metal.
sentences.cn: 悬臂是表面喷沙的亚光银色金属.

sentences.en: The main point of THISrelease, though , is its matte texture and color.
sentences.cn: 这一款的主要卖点是亚光质地, 润色遮瑕.

sentences.en: These cabinets were not high gloss finish, only matte paint finish and vinyl.
sentences.cn: 这些声箱外壳均不是高光泽, 外壳只有哑光油漆及胶板面的.

sentences.en: Vacuum is not good, we recommend using a matte film.
sentences.cn: 真空呼附欠好, 倡导搁置磨砂胶卷.

words.tran_cn: 铺席子的；纠缠的；暗淡的，无光泽的
纠缠在一起；铺席于…上；使…无光泽（mat的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 无光表面；喷砂面；（镀锡板的）糙面精整

trans.tran_en: A matte colour, paint, or surface is dull rather than shiny
